plot: Holly Hobbie celebrates Christmas together with the "Hey Girls" --- Amy Morris and Carrie Baker. Together, they help a widow and her two sons.
title: Holly Hobbie and Friends: Christmas Wishes
plot_es: Holly Hobbie celebrates Christmas together with the "Hey Girls" --- Amy Morris and Carrie Baker. Together, they help a widow and her two sons.
original_name: Holly Hobbie and Friends: Christmas Wishes
plot_en: Holly Hobbie celebrates Christmas together with the "Hey Girls" --- Amy Morris and Carrie Baker. Together, they help a widow and her two sons.
